title: Salim LVL 1
author: Usama Hassana Asi
blurb: In Lahore, a student's life spirals into chaos when a sinister bangle begins delivering terrifying messages. As she delves deeper into the mystery, the bangle's malevolent influence spreads, endangering her and everyone around her. The closer she gets to uncovering the truth, the more perilous her situation becomes, as this single bangle wreaks havoc on countless lives. Will she be able to break free from its grip before it's too late?
